title: game freezes or lags
body: first noticed in norms/ranked that my game freezes or stutters with no signs of fps drop or ping spike.  i checked out the board and most response is to do the check list for better frames. ive done that and still nothing worked. ive been on a training match to see if its only when the game is under dealing with a bunch of thingys but thats not it. i will literally freeze in game for no reason

It was good thinking testing this in a practice match; don't want to run into this in any more live games! ><

What we're thinking is that this may be some problem with background programs. If you're using Windows 10, make sure that the Game Bar and DVR is disabled. It's been known to interfere with LoL and cause these kinds of problems, so it's best to just remove it from the equation entirely. This guide [**here**](https://www.howtogeek.com/273180/how-to-disable-windows-10s-game-dvr-and-game-bar/) can help you do just that.

If you're not using Win10, instead, try using our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and use the 'Force Repatch' option. Lemme know if either of these steps help out and we'll proceed from there.
